QuestData.Title: Victory is Within Reach
QuestData.Description: We have dealt a crippling blow to the Adherents, but our fight is not yet finished.$B$BGather your allies and prepare for the final siege on Skyreach!$B$B"Shadows gather when the raven swallows the day.$B$BBurning sky is extinguished as black wings fold gently about the heavens.$B$BRest, my children, rest. For even the sun must sleep."$B$BThis was Rukhmar's lullaby, sung by her to the first arakkoa. My, how we've lost our way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Ranjit, Araknath, Rukhran and High Sage Viryx in the Skyreach dungeon.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let us finish what we have started.
